title: The History of Sitcoms with Bill Carter
itunes:title: The History of Sitcoms with Bill Carter
itunes:subtitle: Danny is joined by New York Times writer, author, and producer of CNN's The History of Sitcoms (which airs Sunday nights), Bill Carter. They discuss sitcoms, the impact of representation, Bill's late nite TV coverage, and lots more!*To sup...
description:
Danny is joined by New York Times writer, author, and producer of CNN's The History of Sitcoms (which airs Sunday nights), Bill Carter. They discuss sitcoms, the impact of representation, Bill's late nite TV coverage, and lots more!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
